sentences: Welcome to {server_name}, {name}! We're so glad you're here!
Hey everyone, {name} just joined the neighborhood! Give them a warm welcome!
Look who just moved into {server_name} — welcome, {name}!
{name} has entered the chat! Welcome to the best neighborhood on Discord!
Everybody say hi to {name}! They just joined {server_name}!
The neighborhood just got a little more fabulous — welcome, {name}!
Roll out the rainbow carpet for {name}! Welcome to {server_name}!
{name} just walked through the door! Make them feel at home!
New gaybor alert! Everyone welcome {name} to {server_name}!
Breaking news: {name} is officially a gaybor! Welcome!
The gayborhood HOA has approved {name}'s application. Welcome home!
{name} has been granted their gaybor card. Welcome to {server_name}!
Someone call the welcome committee — {name} just moved in!
Dear {name}, your gayborhood starter pack is in the mail. Welcome!
